title: (Monday) Carrie Underwood In-Studio on Her New Song “Ghost Story” and Vegas Hotel Room + We Celebrate Eddie’s Birthday! + Morgan2 Pleads Her Case to Exec. Producer of CBS’s Superman to be on Shania Twain Episode
itunes:title: (Monday) Carrie Underwood In-Studio on Her New Song “Ghost Story” and Vegas Hotel Room + We Celebrate Eddie’s Birthday! + Morgan2 Pleads Her Case to Exec. Producer of CBS’s Superman to be on Shania Twain Episode
description:
Carrie Underwood stops by to talk about her new song “Ghost Story”, her Las Vegas residency and hotel, and how she will go to Whole Foods to shop by herself. It’s Eddie’s birthday today! We celebrate by playing a fun game to see if something is older or younger than Eddie. Morgan2 is a Shania Twain superfan and now there’s a TV show that she’d be perfect for. We talk to the executive producer of the new CBS show to see if Morgan has what it takes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
